name: v_file_system
description: Safe and easy way to read, write and delete files and directories.

scripts.write_delete_speed_test: bash -c " echo \"\"- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\"\" >> write_speed.txt ; node v_tests/write_speed.promise.js >> write_speed.txt ; echo \"\"- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\"\" >> write_speed.txt ; node v_tests/write_speed.sync.js >> write_speed.txt "
